snippet.title: Woman in hospital after Kangaroo attack
snippet.content: A KANGAROO attack at Hope Island has left a woman in hospital this morning. Around 8am, a woman in her 50s came to the aid of a male golfer who was being attacked by a kangaroo at a recreational location on Hope Island Road. She received a deep laceration to her head as well as other minor injuries as a result of the kangaroo attack. She was transported in a stable condition with non-life threatening injuries to the Gold Coast Private Hospital. The golfer was not injured in the attack. She was transported to hospital in a stable condition. Originally published as
